sentences.sContent: If it is fine tomorrow, I think I'll go boating.
sentences.sContent_eng: If it is fine tomorrow, I think I'll go boating.
sentences.sCn: 如果明天天气好，我想去划船。

sentences.sContent: Mom: Sure, we can go boating there and eat at the farm house.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mom: Sure, we can go boating there and eat at the farm house.
sentences.sCn: 妈妈：当然有拉，我们可以划船，还可以吃到农家菜啊。
